plain: singin in the rain is a musical movie, rain man is a drama, tarzan is an adventure movie, boys dont cry is a drama, fight club is an action movie, the insider is a drama, no way out is a thriller, arthur is a comedy, parenthood is a drama, diner is a drama, cabaret is a musical, auntie mame is a comedy, guys and dolls is a musical, the hunger games is a fantasy, mr mom is a comedy.
